content.original: Data Piracy
content.prevOriginal: Data Piracy
content.content: Пиратство данных

content.original: Commander, once you reach the base I'll be able to start extracting the data. It shouldn't take very long; I can't imagine their data security is very sophisticated.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, once you reach the base I'll be able to start extracting the data. It shouldn't take very long; I can't imagine their data security is very sophisticated.
content.content: Командир, как только вы доберетесь до базы, я смогу начать извлекать данные. Это не займет много времени; Я не могу представить, чтобы их безопасность данных была очень сложной.

content.original: Physical security, on the other hand... I'm seeing what looks like turrets around the facility.
content.prevOriginal: Physical security, on the other hand... I'm seeing what looks like turrets around the facility.
content.content: Физическая охрана, хотя... Я вижу что-то похожее на турели вокруг объекта.

content.original: We should get eyes on that base before we charge in shooting. This should be a good vantage point.
content.prevOriginal: We should get eyes on that base before we charge in shooting. This should be a good vantage point.
content.content: Нужно осмотреть эту базу прежде чем атаковать. Это должно быть хорошее место для обзора.

content.original: Aaaand... done. That's all the data, Commander. I'm ready for extraction.
content.prevOriginal: Aaaand... done. That's all the data, Commander. I'm ready for extraction.
content.content: Иии... готово. Это все данные, командир. Можно собираться и улетать.

content.original: Damn! Commander, I didn't get the download.
content.prevOriginal: Damn! Commander, I didn't get the download.
content.content: Черт! Командир, мне не удалось скачать.

content.original: Bogeys on sensors!
content.prevOriginal: Bogeys on sensors!
content.content: Новые точки на радаре!

content.original: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.
content.prevOriginal: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.
content.content: [GENERIC VO] Зона не зачищена, командир. Устраните оппозицию, прежде чем перейти к следующей цели.

content.original: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.
content.prevOriginal: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.
content.content: [GENERIC VO] На сенсорах чисто, переходите к следующей задаче.

content.original: Dropship inbound for landing! We're going to get in and out quick!
content.prevOriginal: Dropship inbound for landing! We're going to get in and out quick!
content.content: Десантный корабль заходит на посадку! Быстро выходим и  уходим как пришли!

content.original: Oh hey, just like I said. Turrets. Watch yourself, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: Oh hey, just like I said. Turrets. Watch yourself, Commander.
content.content: О, как я и сказал. Турели. Осторожнее там, командир.

content.original: There's the facility, Commander. Move in and neutralize any defenses.
content.prevOriginal: There's the facility, Commander. Move in and neutralize any defenses.
content.content: Вот и объект, командир. Подойдите и нейтрализуйте любую оборону.

content.original: Uh, folks? I just spotted more engine signatures -- 'Mechs powering up. More bad guys are on their way to you, boss.
content.prevOriginal: Uh, folks? I just spotted more engine signatures -- 'Mechs powering up. More bad guys are on their way to you, boss.
content.content: Эм, ребята? Я только что засёк еще сигнатуры двигателей. Они заводят мехи. Еще больше плохишей идут к вам, босс.

content.original: This shouldn't be too difficult, but we'll need Dr. Murad on the ground to do the actual data hacking. She's already agreed to go in with your team.
content.prevOriginal: This shouldn't be too difficult, but we'll need Dr. Murad on the ground to do the actual data hacking. She's already agreed to go in with your team.
content.content: Это не должно быть слишком сложно, но нам понадобится доктор Мурад на земле, чтобы осуществить взлом данных. Она уже согласилась отправиться с вашей командой.

content.original: The objective to scout the base that is being captured. Must be completed before the actual capture of the base.
content.prevOriginal: The objective to scout the base that is being captured. Must be completed before the actual capture of the base.
content.content: Цель: разведать захватываемую базу. Нужно успеть до завершения захвата.

content.prevOriginal: Scout the Facility

content.prevOriginal: Pacify the Area around the Base
content.content: Зачистите зону вокруг базы

content.prevOriginal: The primary objective to destroy the force that tries to remove the player from the captured base.

content.original: Destroy the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Reinforcements
content.prevOriginal: Destroy the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Reinforcements
content.content: Уничтожьте подкрепления от {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym}

content.original: The chunk controlled objective to destroy the turrets for the base, if the chunk is active.
content.prevOriginal: The chunk controlled objective to destroy the turrets for the base, if the chunk is active.
content.content: The chunk controlled objective to destroy the turrets for the base, if the chunk is active.

content.original: Eliminate Base Turrets
content.prevOriginal: Eliminate Base Turrets
content.content: Уничтожить турели базы

content.original: We've been monitoring communications traffic on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}, and discerned a pattern. There's a well-defended {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} base that we suspect of being a secure data storage facility. We'd like your team to land, capture the base, and take a complete image of the contents of their databases. Once the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces realize what we're doing, they'll launch a counteroffensive, so we'll need you to stay in the field until the download is complete.
content.prevOriginal: We've been monitoring communications traffic on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}, and discerned a pattern. There's a well-defended {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} base that we suspect of being a secure data storage facility. We'd like your team to land, capture the base, and take a complete image of the contents of their databases. Once the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces realize what we're doing, they'll launch a counteroffensive, so we'll need you to stay in the field until the download is complete.
content.content: Мы прослушивали переговоры на {TGT_SYSTEM.name} и обнаружили закономерность. Есть хорошо защищенная база {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym}, которая, мы подозреваем, является хранилищем баз данных. Мы бы хотели, чтобы ваша команда приземлилась, взяла под контроль здание и сделала полную копию образа содержимого их баз данных. Как только силы {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} поймут, чем вы заняты, они начнут контр наступление, поэтому нам нужно, чтобы вы оставались удерживали позиции до завершения загрузки.

content.prevOriginal: Let's get our forces to a position where we can better observe the enemy movements, and get eyes on the facility.

content.original: We have long suspected that there is a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} research station hidden in the {TGT_SYSTEM.name} system, and we've finally gotten wind of its possible location. We need a few brave, and plausibly deniable, mercenaries to secure the location for a dropship extraction of any valuable scientific personnel.
content.prevOriginal: We have long suspected that there is a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} research station hidden in the {TGT_SYSTEM.name} system, and we've finally gotten wind of its possible location. We need a few brave, and plausibly deniable, mercenaries to secure the location for a dropship extraction of any valuable scientific personnel.
content.content: Мы давно подозревали, что существует научно-исследовательская станция {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym}, скрытая в системе {TGT_SYSTEM.name}, и мы наконец обнаружили координаты ее возможного местоположения. Нам нужно несколько смелых и не задающих вопросов наёмников, чтобы зачистить территорию для посадки дропшипа, который заберёт весь ценный научный персонал.

content.original: Lodgement
content.prevOriginal: Lodgement
content.content: Жилище

content.original: I don't like dropping dark like this. Meyer, we need some eyes on the target. Any thoughts?
content.prevOriginal: I don't like dropping dark like this. Meyer, we need some eyes on the target. Any thoughts?
content.content: Мне не нравится высаживаться в такой темноте. Мейер, нам нужно разглядеть объект. Есть мысли?

content.original: Um, let me look... Okay, this location seems like a good vantage point. You should be able to see the facility from there.
content.prevOriginal: Um, let me look... Okay, this location seems like a good vantage point. You should be able to see the facility from there.
content.content: Так. дайте-ка посмотреть... Окей, это место кажется удобной точкой наблюдения. Оттуда должен быть хороший обзор на объект.

content.original: Roger. Commander, move up to the location Meyer indicated, and we'll make a plan from there.
content.prevOriginal: Roger. Commander, move up to the location Meyer indicated, and we'll make a plan from there.
content.content: Вас понял. Командир, двигайтесь к месту, указанному Мейер и уходим как планировали.

content.original: We're in control of the area, Commander. I'll signal to the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} forces to begin their landing. Good work.
content.prevOriginal: We're in control of the area, Commander. I'll signal to the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} forces to begin their landing. Good work.
content.content: Район под нашим контролем, командир. Я подаю сигнал войскам {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} к высадке. Хорошая работа.

content.original: I'll have to signal to our employers to call off their landing. Disappointing.
content.prevOriginal: I'll have to signal to our employers to call off their landing. Disappointing.
content.content: Я должен послать сигнал нашим работодателям, чтобы они отменили высадку. Печально.

content.original: Bogeys on sensors!
content.prevOriginal: Bogeys on sensors!
content.content: Новые точки на радаре!

content.prevOriginal: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.
content.content: [GENERIC VO] Зона не зачищена, командир. Устраните оппозицию, прежде чем перейти к следующей цели.

content.prevOriginal: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.

content.original: Dropship inbound for landing! We're going to get in and out quick!
content.prevOriginal: Dropship inbound for landing! We're going to get in and out quick!
content.content: Десантный корабль заходит на посадку! Быстро выходим и  уходим как пришли!

content.original: I'm seeing turrets powering up around the facility, boss.
content.prevOriginal: I'm seeing turrets powering up around the facility, boss.
content.content: Я вижу включающиеся турели вокруг объекта, босс.

content.original: There's the facility, Commander. As we expected, it's heavily defended. Be cautious.
content.prevOriginal: There's the facility, Commander. As we expected, it's heavily defended. Be cautious.
content.content: Вот этот объект, командир. Как мы и ожидали, он сильно защищен. Будьте осторожны.

content.original: I'm seeing more 'Mech engine signatures approaching the base. Looks like there's going to be more company coming.
content.prevOriginal: I'm seeing more 'Mech engine signatures approaching the base. Looks like there's going to be more company coming.
content.content: Я вижу еще больше сигнатур двигателей мехов, приближающихся к базе. Похоже, появится еще одна компания.

content.original: We're going to land in a hot AO, with no idea where we are, capture a well-defended military facility, and hold it against a counter-attack. What could go wrong?
content.prevOriginal: We're going to land in a hot AO, with no idea where we are, capture a well-defended military facility, and hold it against a counter-attack. What could go wrong?
content.content: Мы собираемся приземлиться в горячую точку, без понятия, где мы находимся, захватываем хорошо защищенный военный объект и удерживаем его от контратак. Что может пойти не так?

content.original: The objective to scout the base that is being captured. Must be completed before the actual capture of the base.
content.prevOriginal: The objective to scout the base that is being captured. Must be completed before the actual capture of the base.

content.prevOriginal: Pacify the Area around the Base

content.prevOriginal: Eliminate Base Turrets

content.original: Commander, we're preparing a series of operations on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}. However, before we can begin, we need a secure lodgement to bring military units and supplies down to the surface. We've identified a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} military facility that will be ideal for our purposes. We need you to land a strike force, capture the facility, and hold it until we can bring down our people to secure the location. Because this operation is covert and on an extremely tight schedule, you'll be inserting with no topographical intel.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, we're preparing a series of operations on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}. However, before we can begin, we need a secure lodgement to bring military units and supplies down to the surface. We've identified a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} military facility that will be ideal for our purposes. We need you to land a strike force, capture the facility, and hold it until we can bring down our people to secure the location. Because this operation is covert and on an extremely tight schedule, you'll be inserting with no topographical intel.
content.content: Командир, мы готовим серию операций на {TGT_SYSTEM.name}. Однако прежде, чем мы сможем начать, нам нужна надёжная база, чтобы развернуть вооруженные силы и снабжение. Мы определили военный объект {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym}, который идеально подходит для наших целей. Нам нужно, чтобы вы высадили ударную группу, захватили объект и удерживали его, пока мы подтягиваем наших людей, чтобы обезопасить зону. Поскольку эта операция является скрытой и сжатой по срокам, вам придется высаживаться без данных топографической разведки.

content.original: Capturing Production
content.prevOriginal: Capturing Production
content.content: Захват производства

content.original: The manufacturing facility is just ahead, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: The manufacturing facility is just ahead, Commander.
content.content: Производственный комплекс прямо впереди, командир.

content.original: Before we start our attack, we should recon the facility's defenses from a defensible position.
content.prevOriginal: Before we start our attack, we should recon the facility's defenses from a defensible position.
content.content: Прежде чем начать атаку, мы должны разведать оборону объекта с защищенной позиции.

content.original: Once that's done, we'll move in and capture the base. Good luck, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: Once that's done, we'll move in and capture the base. Good luck, Commander.
content.content: Как только это будет сделано, мы выдвинемся и захватим базу. Удачи, командир.

content.original: That's it. We've taken control of the facility, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: That's it. We've taken control of the facility, Commander.
content.content: Вот и всё. Мы взяли под контроль объект, командир.

content.original: Given what we've seen here, I'm guessing {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} will be very pleased with our work.
content.prevOriginal: Given what we've seen here, I'm guessing {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} will be very pleased with our work.
content.content: Учитывая то, что мы видели здесь, полагаю, {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} будет очень доволен нашей работой.

content.original: Doesn't seem like we're going to be able to win this one, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: Doesn't seem like we're going to be able to win this one, Commander.
content.content: Похоже, мы не сможем выиграть на этот раз, командир.

content.prevOriginal: Dropship inbound for landing, Commander. Once they secure the facility, we're dusting off.
content.content: Десантный корабль заходит на посадку, командр. Как только они возьмут под охрану объект, мы уходим.

content.prevOriginal: Commander, a word of warning, we have reports this base may have gun emplacements for point defense.
content.content: Командир, предупреждаю: у нас есть данные, что эта база может иметь орудийные установки для обороны периметра.

content.prevOriginal: Turrets, boss. Just keep an eye out in case they are online.
content.content: Турели, босс. Просто будьте на чеку, на случай если они включатся.

content.original: That's a Star League era manufacturing facility, all right. No wonder {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} wants it so bad.
content.prevOriginal: That's a Star League era manufacturing facility, all right. No wonder {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} wants it so bad.
content.content: Это производственное предприятие времен Звездной Лиги, это точно. Неудивительно, что {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} хочет заполучить его.

content.original: Be careful of reinforcements. We're getting intel that there are additional enemy forces rallying to the facility.
content.prevOriginal: Be careful of reinforcements. We're getting intel that there are additional enemy forces rallying to the facility.
content.content: Остерегайтесь подкреплений. Мы получаем информацию, что есть дополнительные вражеские силы, которые выдвигаются к объекту.

content.original: They haven't told us what, precisely, the facility is producing, but given the strength of enemy forces on the ground, it's something worth protecting.
content.prevOriginal: They haven't told us what, precisely, the facility is producing, but given the strength of enemy forces on the ground, it's something worth protecting.
content.content: Они не сказали, что конкретно производит завод, но учитывая силу вражеских наземных сил, это стоит защищать.

To maintain the balance of power in this system, {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} needs to capture this facility. You'll make a surgical strike, occupy the base, and hold it until {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} forces can arrive to take control.
content.prevOriginal: We've discovered that {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} has reactivated an old manufacturing facility in this system. Чтобы сохранить баланс сил, {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} должны захватить этот объект. Вы нанесете хирургический удар, займете базу и будете удерживать ее до прибытия сил {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym}.

content.prevOriginal: Mech Factory

content.prevOriginal: Sure enough, Commander, there's a lot of comm chatter coming from that factory.
content.content: Без сомнения, командир, с этой фабрики исходит много радиопереговоров.

content.prevOriginal: Let's move up to a good observation point and recon the facility and its defenders.
content.content: Выдвигайтесь к точке наблюдения и проведите разведку объекта и сил защитников.

content.prevOriginal: Once we know what we're up against, move in and take the factory, Commander. Oliveira out.

content.prevOriginal: The factory is under control, Commander, and {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} forces are setting up defenses. Good work.

content.prevOriginal: We won't be able to take this one. Time to pull out, Commander.

content.prevOriginal: We picked up a coded transmission from the surface of {TGT_SYSTEM.name}: {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} scouts report a previously unknown manufacturing plant has been activated by {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces, and they're broadcasting what we believe might be pre-war blueprints to an unknown recipient somewhere in the system. We need you to move in and capture that facility, intact, and protect it while we mobilize a garrison.
content.content: Мы перехватили закодированную передачу с поверхности {TGT_SYSTEM.name}: разведчики {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} сообщают, что ранее неизвестная производственная фабрика была активирована силами {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} и они передают то, что, по нашему мнению, может быть довоенными чертежами неизвестному получателю где-то в системе. Нам нужно, чтобы вы выдвинулись, захватили объект в целости и сохранности, пока мы мобилизуем гарнизон.

content.original: Plunder
content.prevOriginal: Plunder
content.content: Ограбление

content.original: The facility where the drugs are being kept is just ahead, commander.
content.prevOriginal: The facility where the drugs are being kept is just ahead, commander.
content.content: Объект, где хранятся наркотики, прямо впереди, командир.

content.original: From here, we should be able to get eyes on the depot and a look at its defenses.
content.prevOriginal: From here, we should be able to get eyes on the depot and a look at its defenses.
content.content: Отсюда мы должны быть в состоянии разведать склад и его оборону.

content.original: Clear out any defenders, and let's secure the place and get paid.
content.prevOriginal: Clear out any defenders, and let's secure the place and get paid.
content.content: Уничтожьте всех защитников, обеспечьте безопасность зоны и вы получите оплату.

content.original: The base is ours, Commander. I'll notify our friends that they can move in and pick up the cargo.
content.prevOriginal: The base is ours, Commander. I'll notify our friends that they can move in and pick up the cargo.
content.content: База наша, командир. Я уведомлю наших друзей, что они могут выдвигаться забирать груз.

content.original: Looks like our friends will have to find someone else to steal the cargo for them.
content.prevOriginal: Looks like our friends will have to find someone else to steal the cargo for them.
content.content: Похоже, нашим друзьям придется найти кого-то еще, чтобы украсть груз для них.

content.original: Bogeys on sensors!
content.prevOriginal: Bogeys on sensors!
content.content: Новые точки на радаре!

content.original: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.
content.prevOriginal: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.
content.content: [GENERIC VO] Зона не зачищена, командир. Устраните оппозицию, прежде чем перейти к следующей цели.

content.original: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.
content.prevOriginal: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.
content.content: [GENERIC VO] На сенсорах чисто, переходите к следующей задаче.

content.original: Dropship inbound for landing! We're going to get in and out quick!
content.prevOriginal: Dropship inbound for landing! We're going to get in and out quick!
content.content: Десантный корабль заходит на посадку! Быстро выходим и  уходим как пришли!

content.original: Commander, a word of warning, we have reports this base may have gun emplacements for point defense.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, a word of warning, we have reports this base may have gun emplacements for point defense.
content.content: Командир, предупреждаю: у нас есть данные, что эта база может иметь орудийные установки для обороны периметра.

content.original: Given what they're keeping here, I can't say I'm surprised.
content.prevOriginal: Given what they're keeping here, I can't say I'm surprised.
content.content: Учитывая то, что они хранят здесь, не могу сказать, что удивлен.

content.original: There's the facility. Looks like it's got a single lance defending it, and... confirmed, turrets.
content.prevOriginal: There's the facility. Looks like it's got a single lance defending it, and... confirmed, turrets.
content.content: Вот и объект. Похоже, его защищает один отряд. И, да... турели тоже там.

content.original: We're seeing some additional units in the region, so watch for possible reinforcements.
content.prevOriginal: We're seeing some additional units in the region, so watch for possible reinforcements.
content.content: Мы наблюдаем дополнительные силы противника в этом регионе, так что ожидайте возможного подкрепления.

content.original: Spazz is a nasty, nasty drug, Commander, but not really recreational in any way. If some MechWarrior wants to burn themself out on the stuff, that's on them.
content.prevOriginal: Spazz is a nasty, nasty drug, Commander, but not really recreational in any way. If some MechWarrior wants to burn themself out on the stuff, that's on them.
content.content: Спазз - очень сильный наркотик, командир, и никоим образом не расслабляющий. Если какой-то мехвоин хочет убить себя этой дрянью, это его дело.

content.original: The objective to scout the base that is being captured. Must be completed before the actual capture of the base.
content.prevOriginal: The objective to scout the base that is being captured. Must be completed before the actual capture of the base.
content.content: Цель: разведать захватываемую базу. Нужно успеть до завершения захвата.

content.original: Scout the Depot
content.prevOriginal: Scout the Depot
content.content: Разведайте склад

content.prevOriginal: The objective to optionally destroy the defenders of the base.
content.content: Необязательная задача: уничтожить защитников базы.

content.original: Destroy the Enemy Force
content.prevOriginal: Destroy the Enemy Force
content.content: Уничтожить вражеские силы

content.prevOriginal: The objective for the player to move into and capture the base.

content.original: Capture the Depot with Friendly 'Mechs
content.prevOriginal: Capture the Depot with Friendly 'Mechs
content.content: Захватить склад дружественными мехами

content.prevOriginal: HIDDEN TIMER, NO NEED TO EDIT: This is the hidden timer objective that will trigger the enemy reinforcements.
content.content: HIDDEN TIMER, NO NEED TO EDIT: This is the hidden timer objective that will trigger the enemy reinforcements.

content.prevOriginal: Hold Out as Enemies Counter Attack
content.content: Выдержать контратаку врагов

content.original: This is a general objective to indicate the player must keep playing and eliminate enemies as they come.
content.prevOriginal: This is a general objective to indicate the player must keep playing and eliminate enemies as they come.
content.content: Это общая цель, указывающая, что отряд должен продолжать биться и уничтожать приходящие силы врага.

content.original: Pacify the Area around the Depot
content.prevOriginal: Pacify the Area around the Depot
content.content: Зачистите зону вокруг склада

content.original: The primary objective to destroy the force that tries to remove the player from the captured base.
content.prevOriginal: The primary objective to destroy the force that tries to remove the player from the captured base.
content.content: Основная цель - уничтожить отряд, который пытается выбить нас с захваченной базы.

content.original: Destroy the Enemy Reinforcements
content.prevOriginal: Destroy the Enemy Reinforcements
content.content: Уничтожить вражеское подкрепление

content.original: The chunk controlled objective to destroy the turrets for the base, if the chunk is active.
content.prevOriginal: The chunk controlled objective to destroy the turrets for the base, if the chunk is active.
content.content: The chunk controlled objective to destroy the turrets for the base, if the chunk is active.

content.original: Eliminate Depot Turrets
content.prevOriginal: Eliminate Depot Turrets
content.content: Уничтожить турели склада

content.original: We've been following this shipment of Spazz that the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} authorities here on {TGT_SYSTEM.name} intercepted. You'd think that, given all the things they say about Spazz, they'd have torched the stuff already. But instead they've locked it up in a secure depot. I'm sure they won't mind if we take that stuff off their hands. We have much better uses for it than just blowing it all up.
content.prevOriginal: We've been following this shipment of Spazz that the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} authorities here on {TGT_SYSTEM.name} intercepted. You'd think that, given all the things they say about Spazz, they'd have torched the stuff already. But instead they've locked it up in a secure depot. I'm sure they won't mind if we take that stuff off their hands. We have much better uses for it than just blowing it all up.
content.content: Мы отслеживали поставку спазза, которую местные власти {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} перехватили здесь на {TGT_SYSTEM.name}. Можно подумать, что, учитывая всё то, что правительство говорит о спаззе, они уже давно сожгли его. Но вместо этого они спрятали его в надежном складе. Я уверен, что они не будут возражать, если мы отберём его у них из рук. У нас есть для него гораздо лучшее применение, чем просто уничтожить.

content.original: Professional Facility Management
content.prevOriginal: Professional Facility Management
content.content: Профессиональное управление недвижимостью

content.original: Commander, we're in the AO. I'm seeing those turrets we were promised, but no sign of the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} team that's supposed to be here.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, we're in the AO. I'm seeing those turrets we were promised, but no sign of the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} team that's supposed to be here.
content.content: Командир, мы на позиции. Я вижу турели, о которых нас предупреждали, но нет никаких признаков команды {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym}. Они могут быть где-то здесь.

content.original: We have to assume they're out on patrol. Commander, this position should give you a decent view of the facility and the turrets. Move up and see what we're facing.
content.prevOriginal: We have to assume they're out on patrol. Commander, this position should give you a decent view of the facility and the turrets. Move up and see what we're facing.
content.content: Мы считаем, что они на патрулировании. Командир, эта позиция должна дать вам хороший обзор объекта и турелей. Выдвигайтесь и посмотрите, с чем мы имеем дело.

content.original: I could do without the giant ego that mercenary seems to carry around everywhere.
content.prevOriginal: I could do without the giant ego that mercenary seems to carry around everywhere.
content.content: Я бы предпочёл обойтись без раздутого эго, которое наемники похоже приносят с собой.

content.original: Sorry, Sumire, I don't speak Pot or Kettle.
content.prevOriginal: Sorry, Sumire, I don't speak Pot or Kettle.
content.content: Извини, Сумир. I don't speak Pot or Kettle.

content.original: Well, that was a lot more exciting than we bargained for.
content.prevOriginal: Well, that was a lot more exciting than we bargained for.
content.content: Что ж, это было намного интереснее, чем мы рассчитывали.

content.original: Bogeys on sensors!
content.prevOriginal: Bogeys on sensors!
content.content: Новые точки на радаре!

content.original: Heads up, Commander; dropship inbound.
content.prevOriginal: Heads up, Commander; dropship inbound.
content.content: Внимание командир. Десантный корабль приближается.

content.original: Getting an active ping from the turrets. I'm going to get some altitude so I don't get any more bullet holes in my Leopard.
content.prevOriginal: Getting an active ping from the turrets. I'm going to get some altitude so I don't get any more bullet holes in my Leopard.
content.content: Замечен активный пинг от турелей. Я собираюсь набрать высоту, чтобы больше не получать дырки от пуль в моем Леопарде.

content.original: We need to clear those turrets out if we're going to hold the base, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: We need to clear those turrets out if we're going to hold the base, Commander.
content.content: Мы должны уничтожить те турели, если мы собираемся удержать базу, командир.

content.original: There's the facility. Still no sign of the opfor, Meyer?
content.prevOriginal: There's the facility. Still no sign of the opfor, Meyer?
content.content: Вот и объект. Мейер, противник себя ещё не показал?

content.original: I... Yeah, I've got something. Multiple engine signatures. 'Mechs, inbound to your location.
content.prevOriginal: I... Yeah, I've got something. Multiple engine signatures. 'Mechs, inbound to your location.
content.content: У меня... Да, у меня есть кое-что. Множественные сигнатуры двигателей. 'Мехи! Двигаются в вашу сторону.

content.original: Ah. I prefer opposition that isn't the usual local idiots. Are you local idiots? I suppose we'll find out.
content.prevOriginal: Ah. I prefer opposition that isn't the usual local idiots. Are you local idiots? I suppose we'll find out.
content.content: Эх. Я предпочитаю сопротивление, которое не свойственно простым местным идиотам. Вы местные идиоты? Полагаю, мы скоро это выясним.

content.original: Ha! You must be the janitor they sent to turn the lights back on.
content.prevOriginal: Ha! You must be the janitor they sent to turn the lights back on.
content.content: Ха! Вы, должно быть, уборщик, которого они послали, чтобы снова включить свет.

content.original: I prefer to think of myself as a facility management professional.
content.prevOriginal: I prefer to think of myself as a facility management professional.
content.content: Я предпочитаю думать о себе как о специалисте по управлению недвижимостью.

content.original: Turrets always make things more complicated, but this seems like a pretty routine operation, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: Turrets always make things more complicated, but this seems like a pretty routine operation, Commander.
content.content: Турели всегда всё усложняют, но эта операция кажется довольно обыденной, командир.

content.original: Eliminate Base Turrets
content.prevOriginal: Eliminate Base Turrets
content.content: Уничтожьте турели базы

content.original: Fifteen years ago we lost track of a facility here on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}, and {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} intelligence believed it had been permanently shut down. A month ago, an orbiting spy satellite picked up signs that the facility had been brought back online. Our current guess is that a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} team was dispatched to bring the base back up to operational capacity. We'd rather not have sensitive radar backed by armed turrets and flak batteries aimed at the skies of {TGT_SYSTEM.name}. We'd like you to clear their team out and hold the facility while our own people land to scour it for useful intel.
content.prevOriginal: Fifteen years ago we lost track of a facility here on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}, and {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} intelligence believed it had been permanently shut down. A month ago, an orbiting spy satellite picked up signs that the facility had been brought back online. Our current guess is that a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} team was dispatched to bring the base back up to operational capacity. We'd rather not have sensitive radar backed by armed turrets and flak batteries aimed at the skies of {TGT_SYSTEM.name}. We'd like you to clear their team out and hold the facility while our own people land to scour it for useful intel.
content.content: Пятнадцать лет назад мы потеряли из виду объект, здесь на {TGT_SYSTEM.name}, и разведка {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} полагала, что он был окончательно отключен. Месяц назад орбитальный спутник-шпион обнаружил признаки того, что объект был возвращен в строй. В настоящее время мы предполагаем, что туда была направлена команда из {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym}, чтобы вернуть базу в рабочее состояние. Мы бы предпочли не иметь рядом чувствительного радара поддерживаемого вооруженными турелями и зенитными батареями, направленными на небо {TGT_SYSTEM.name}. Мы бы хотели, чтобы вы уничтожили их команду и удерживали объект, пока наши люди не приземлятся, чтобы поискать полезную информацию.

content.original: Pulling Linchpins
content.prevOriginal: Pulling Linchpins
content.content: Выдёргивание сорняков

content.original: We're here to capture the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} military Outpost.
content.prevOriginal: We're here to capture the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} military Outpost.
content.content: Мы здесь, чтобы захватить военный аванпост {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym}.

content.original: Let's get our forces to a position where we can better observe the enemy movements, and perhaps get eye on the facility.
content.prevOriginal: Let's get our forces to a position where we can better observe the enemy movements, and perhaps get eye on the facility.
content.content: Давайте выведем наши силы на позицию, где мы сможем лучше наблюдать за перемещениями противника и может быть рассмотреть объект.

content.original: Eliminate opposition and take control of the territory, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: Eliminate opposition and take control of the territory, Commander.
content.content: Устраните сопротивление и возьмите под контроль территорию, командир.

content.original: The Outpost is under our control, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: The Outpost is under our control, Commander.
content.content: Аванпост под нашим контролем командир.

content.original: We're ready to send in the extraction ships.
content.prevOriginal: We're ready to send in the extraction ships.
content.content: Мы готовы отправить корабль эвакуации.

content.original: Sit tight. {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} should be pleased with the results.
content.prevOriginal: Sit tight. {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} should be pleased with the results.
content.content: Ожидайте, командир. {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} должны быть довольны результатами.

content.original: We won't be able to take this one. Pack it in, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: We won't be able to take this one. Pack it in, Commander.
content.content: Мы уже не сможем это захватить. Пакуем вещи, командир.

content.original: Bogeys on sensors!
content.prevOriginal: Bogeys on sensors!
content.content: Новые точки на радаре!

content.original: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.
content.prevOriginal: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.
content.content: [GENERIC VO] Зона не зачищена, командир. Устраните оппозицию, прежде чем перейти к следующей цели.

content.original: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.
content.prevOriginal: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.
content.content: [GENERIC VO] На сенсорах чисто, переходите к следующей задаче.

content.original: Dropship inbound for landing!
content.prevOriginal: Dropship inbound for landing!
content.content: Десантный корабль заходит на посадку!

content.original: Commander, a word of warning, we have reports this base may have gun emplacements for point defense.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, a word of warning, we have reports this base may have gun emplacements for point defense.
content.content: Командир, предупреждаю: у нас есть данные, что эта база может иметь орудийные установки для обороны периметра.

content.original: Turrets, boss. Just keep an eye out in case they are online.
content.prevOriginal: Turrets, boss. Just keep an eye out in case they are online.
content.content: Турели, босс. Просто будьте на чеку, на случай если они включатся.

content.original: Alright, you should have good view of the Outpost now.
content.prevOriginal: Alright, you should have good view of the Outpost now.
content.content: Хорошо, теперь у вас должен быть хороший вид на аванпост.

content.original: Be careful of additional forces inbound. Our employer says they softened up them up a bit, but now they're rallying back at the Outpost. Expect contact.
content.prevOriginal: Be careful of additional forces inbound. Our employer says they softened up them up a bit, but now they're rallying back at the Outpost. Expect contact.
content.content: Остерегайтесь прибытия дополнительных сил. Наш работодатель говорит, что они немного расслабились, но теперь они выдвигаются обратно к аванпосту. Ожидайте контакта.

content.original: Commander, the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} plan is sound, as long as we're okay with intentionally setting up an ambush on ourselves.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} plan is sound, as long as we're okay with intentionally setting up an ambush on ourselves.
content.content: Командир, план {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} такой здравый, мы конечно не против намеренно устроить засаду на нас самих.

content.original: We've recently discovered a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} military outpost in an extremely inconvenient location, strangling trade and movement for our personnel in the area. Your mission: eliminate enemy defenses, then capture and hold the base long enough for {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} forces to take possession. We'll support your action by drawing off some of the defenders ahead of time, so if these units retreat to the base, they'll already be weakened by our troops.
content.prevOriginal: We've recently discovered a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} military outpost in an extremely inconvenient location, strangling trade and movement for our personnel in the area. Your mission: eliminate enemy defenses, then capture and hold the base long enough for {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} forces to take possession. We'll support your action by drawing off some of the defenders ahead of time, so if these units retreat to the base, they'll already be weakened by our troops.
content.content: Недавно мы обнаружили военный аванпост {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} в крайне неудобном месте, мешающий нашей торговле и передвижению персонала в этом районе. Ваша задача: уничтожить оборону противника, затем захватить и удерживать базу достаточно долго, чтобы вооруженные силы {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} завладели ею. Мы поддержим ваши действия, заблаговременно уведя подальше часть охраны, поэтому, если эти отряды врнутся на базу, они уже будут ослаблены нашими войсками.

content.original: Steal the Prototype
content.prevOriginal: Steal the Prototype
content.content: Украсть прототип

content.original: Commander, this is the location provided by our employers.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, this is the location provided by our employers.
content.content: Командир, это то самое место, на которое нам указал заказчик.

content.original: Let's get our forces to a position where we can better observe the enemy movements, and get eyes on the base.
content.prevOriginal: Let's get our forces to a position where we can better observe the enemy movements, and get eyes on the base.
content.content: Давайте выведем наши силы на позицию, где мы сможем лучше наблюдать за перемещениями противника и рассмотреть базу.

content.original: Once we have a better picture of the situation, eliminate any defending forces and move into the base.
content.prevOriginal: Once we have a better picture of the situation, eliminate any defending forces and move into the base.
content.content: Как только мы получим более четкое представление о ситуации, уничтожьте любые силы обороны и выдвигайтесь к базе.

content.original: The Research Facility is ours, Commander; {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} will be pleased to have this prototype in their hands.
content.prevOriginal: The Research Facility is ours, Commander; {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} will be pleased to have this prototype in their hands.
content.content: Исследовательский центр наш, командир; {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} будут рады заполучить прототип в свои руки.

content.original: We won't be able to take this one. I'm pulling us out, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: We won't be able to take this one. I'm pulling us out, Commander.
content.content: Мы уже не сможем это захватить. Я вытаскиваю нас, командир.

content.original: Bogeys on sensors!
content.prevOriginal: Bogeys on sensors!
content.content: Новые точки на радаре!

content.original: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.
content.prevOriginal: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.
content.content: [GENERIC VO] Зона не зачищена, командир. Устраните оппозицию, прежде чем перейти к следующей цели.

content.original: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.
content.prevOriginal: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.
content.content: [GENERIC VO] На сенсорах чисто, переходите к следующей задаче.

content.original: Dropship inbound for landing! We're going to get in and out quick!
content.prevOriginal: Dropship inbound for landing! We're going to get in and out quick!
content.content: Десантный корабль заходит на посадку! Быстро выходим и  уходим как пришли!

content.original: Commander, a word of warning: we have reports this base may have gun emplacements for point defense.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, a word of warning: we have reports this base may have gun emplacements for point defense.
content.content: Командир, предупреждаю: у нас есть данные, что эта база может иметь орудийные установки для обороны периметра.

content.original: Turrets, boss. Just keep an eye out in case they are online.
content.prevOriginal: Turrets, boss. Just keep an eye out in case they are online.
content.content: Турели, босс. Просто будьте на чеку, на случай если они включатся.

content.original: All right, you should have good view of the Research Facility now.
content.prevOriginal: All right, you should have good view of the Research Facility now.
content.content: Хорошо, теперь у вас должен быть хороший вид на вид на исследовательский центр.

content.original: We're picking up additional units in the area that are rallying to engage you. So keep your eyes open.
content.prevOriginal: We're picking up additional units in the area that are rallying to engage you. So keep your eyes open.
content.content: Мы засекли дополнительный отряд в этом районе, который группируется, чтобы атаковать вас. Так что держите глаза открытыми.

content.original: Commander, I expect the defenses on the facility to be substantial. But if we were bothered by the odds, we wouldn't be mercenaries.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, I expect the defenses on the facility to be substantial. But if we were bothered by the odds, we wouldn't be mercenaries.
content.content: Командир, я предполагаю, что защита на объекте будет значительной. Но если бы нас беспокоили предположения, мы бы не были наемниками.

content.original: We've learned that {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} here in {TGT_SYSTEM.name} has been busy working on a new water filtration technology, which is both extremely valuable and likely to shift the balance of power in the region by opening up more worlds for colonization. We've discovered where they're working on the latest prototype. We know that they are monitoring the location of our own 'Mechs in the area, so we need a mercenary lance to make the vanguard assault and catch them by surprise. We'll then take over the facility with {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} forces.
content.prevOriginal: We've learned that {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} here in {TGT_SYSTEM.name} has been busy working on a new water filtration technology, which is both extremely valuable and likely to shift the balance of power in the region by opening up more worlds for colonization. We've discovered where they're working on the latest prototype. We know that they are monitoring the location of our own 'Mechs in the area, so we need a mercenary lance to make the vanguard assault and catch them by surprise. We'll then take over the facility with {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} forces.
content.content: Мы узнали, что {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} здесь, на {TGT_SYSTEM.name}, была занята работой над новой технологией фильтрации воды, которая одновременно чрезвычайно ценна и может изменить баланс сил в регионе, открыв больше миров для колонизации. Мы обнаружили где они работают над последним прототипом. Мы знаем, что они следят за местонахождением наших собственных мехов в этом районе, поэтому нам нужен отряд наемников, чтобы атаковать авангард и застать их со спущенными штанами. Затем мы захватим объект вооруженными силами {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym}.

content.original: Covert Surveillance
content.prevOriginal: Covert Surveillance
content.content: Скрытое наблюдение

content.original: These are the coordinates we received from {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} intelligence.
content.prevOriginal: These are the coordinates we received from {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} intelligence.
content.content: Это координаты, что дала разведка {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym}.

content.original: Move into position to survey the outpost, and let's figure out what we're dealing with here.
content.prevOriginal: Move into position to survey the outpost, and let's figure out what we're dealing with here.
content.content: Выдвигайтесь на позицию, чтобы осмотреть аванпост и выяснить, что нам с ним делать.

content.original: Good luck, Commander. Oliveira out.
content.prevOriginal: Good luck, Commander. Oliveira out.
content.content: Удачи командир. Оливейра, конец связи.

content.original: The outpost is ours, Commander. Our employer has agents inbound to take possession of the data archives.
content.prevOriginal: The outpost is ours, Commander. Our employer has agents inbound to take possession of the data archives.
content.content: Аванпост наш, командир. От нашего работодателя отправились агенты, которые завладеют архивами данных.

content.original: I think we're done here, Commander. What a mess.
content.prevOriginal: I think we're done here, Commander. What a mess.
content.content: Думаю, тут уже всё, командир. Ну и наделали мы тут дел...

content.original: Bogeys on sensors!
content.prevOriginal: Bogeys on sensors!

content.prevOriginal: Dropship inbound for landing! We're going to get in and out quick!
content.content: Десантный корабль заходит на посадку! Быстро выходим и  уходим как пришли!

content.original: Commander, bad news. We're seeing energy signatures for fixed defenses powering up.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, bad news. We're seeing energy signatures for fixed defenses powering up.
content.content: Командир, плохие новости. Мы засекаем, как включаются энергетические сигнатуры обороны.

content.original: Turrets. Remember they can spot you from a very long way off, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: Turrets. Remember they can spot you from a very long way off, Commander.
content.content: Турели. Просто помните, что они могут засечь вас с большого расстояния, командир.

content.original: Sure enough, that facility isn't abandoned at all. We need to sweep it for hostiles and clear them out.
content.prevOriginal: Sure enough, that facility isn't abandoned at all. We need to sweep it for hostiles and clear them out.
content.content: Без сомнения, этот объект ни разу не заброшен. Необходимо прочесать территорию на наличие враждебных сил и зачистить её в случае обнаружения.

content.original: Remember there may be more enemy units in the field, so stay alert.
content.prevOriginal: Remember there may be more enemy units in the field, so stay alert.
content.content: Помните, что на поле боя может быть больше вражеских подразделений, так что будьте начеку.

content.original: How relevant can intel from the ass end of nowhere really be? We're still being paid, so I suppose it doesn't matter, honestly.
content.prevOriginal: How relevant can intel from the ass end of nowhere really be? We're still being paid, so I suppose it doesn't matter, honestly.
content.content: Насколько актуальной может быть информация из жопы мира? Хотя пока нам платят, полагаю, это не важно.

content.prevOriginal: The objective to scout the base that is being captured. Must be completed before the actual capture of the base.

content.original: Eliminate Base Turrets
content.prevOriginal: Eliminate Base Turrets
content.content: Уничтожить турели базы

content.original: Unremarkable, empty systems like this one are the perfect location for covert intelligence gathering operations. We believe there's a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} facility here on {TGT_SYSTEM.Name} doing exactly that. Monitoring the pattern of DropShips making landings on the planet has led {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} analysts to a remote, apparently empty facility. Until just a few days ago, when we picked up the unmasked signature of a 'Mech's fusion engine powering up. That facility isn't empty, and we want the data stored there.
content.prevOriginal: Unremarkable, empty systems like this one are the perfect location for covert intelligence gathering operations. We believe there's a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} facility here on {TGT_SYSTEM.Name} doing exactly that. Monitoring the pattern of DropShips making landings on the planet has led {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} analysts to a remote, apparently empty facility. Until just a few days ago, when we picked up the unmasked signature of a 'Mech's fusion engine powering up. That facility isn't empty, and we want the data stored there.
content.content: Ничем не примечательные, пустые звёздные системы, как эта, являются идеальным местом для скрытых операций по сбору информации. Мы полагаем, что в {TGT_SYSTEM.Name} есть здание {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym}, которое именно этим и занимается. Отслеживая график посадок дропшипов на планету, аналитики {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} наткнулись на отдалённое заброшенное здание. Или оно считалось таковым, пока, пару дней назад, там не засекли явную сигнатуру включения термоядерного двигателя меха. Этот объект точно не пуст и мы хотим данные, что хранятся там.

content.original: Synthetic Plague
content.prevOriginal: Synthetic Plague
content.content: Синтетическая чума

content.original: We're in the AO, Commander. My skin is crawling just thinking about what's out here.
content.prevOriginal: We're in the AO, Commander. My skin is crawling just thinking about what's out here.
content.content: Мы на месте, командир. У меня мурашки по коже, от одной мысли, что хранится здесь.

content.original: Advance to a good recon position and let's see who's guarding that site.
content.prevOriginal: Advance to a good recon position and let's see who's guarding that site.
content.content: Займите хорошую наблюдательную позицию и выясните, кто охраняет это место.

content.original: Oh, and Commander? Don't bring me any souvenirs, okay? Oliveira out.
content.prevOriginal: Oh, and Commander? Don't bring me any souvenirs, okay? Oliveira out.
content.content: Ох, командр? Не принесете мне какой-нибудь сувенир, хорошо? Оливейра, конец связи.

content.original: The disposal team is inbound, Commander. Let's get the hell out of here before our luck changes.
content.prevOriginal: The disposal team is inbound, Commander. Let's get the hell out of here before our luck changes.
content.content: Команда по утилизации прибыла, командир. Уходим отсюда, пока удача не изменила нам.

content.original: We'll need to have a serious debriefing after this one, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: We'll need to have a serious debriefing after this one, Commander.
content.content: После этого нужно будет провести серьезный разбор полетов, командир.

content.original: Bogeys on sensors!
content.prevOriginal: Bogeys on sensors!
content.content: Новые точки на радаре!

content.original: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.
content.prevOriginal: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.
content.content: [GENERIC VO] Зона не зачищена, командир. Устраните оппозицию, прежде чем перейти к следующей цели.

content.original: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.
content.prevOriginal: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.
content.content: [GENERIC VO] На сенсорах чисто, переходите к следующей задаче.

content.original: Dropship inbound for landing! We're going to get in and out quick!
content.prevOriginal: Dropship inbound for landing! We're going to get in and out quick!
content.content: Десантный корабль заходит на посадку! Быстро выходим и  уходим как пришли!

content.original: There's active fixed defenses in there, Commander. They really don't want us taking this site.
content.prevOriginal: There's active fixed defenses in there, Commander. They really don't want us taking this site.
content.content: Там есть активная стационарная защита, командир. Они действительно не хотят, чтобы мы захватили это место.

content.original: At least turrets are easy to outmaneuver. Remember they'll spot you for other units, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: At least turrets are easy to outmaneuver. Remember they'll spot you for other units, Commander.
content.content: По крайней мере, турели легко перехитрить. Помните, что они подсвечивают вас для остальных врагов, командир.

content.original: That's a lot of defense for a supposedly empty facility. I have a bad feeling that our employers are right about this place.
content.prevOriginal: That's a lot of defense for a supposedly empty facility. I have a bad feeling that our employers are right about this place.
content.content: Это серьезная защита для якобы пустого объекта. У меня плохое предчувствие, что наши работодатели правы насчет этого места.

content.original: I'd expect at least one lance of reinforcements in the field, sweeping for intruders. Meaning us.
content.prevOriginal: I'd expect at least one lance of reinforcements in the field, sweeping for intruders. Meaning us.
content.content: Я бы ожидал по крайней мере один отряд подкрепления, разметающих незваных гостей. Имею в виду нас.

content.original: I'll ask the obvious question: how do we know they won't just keep the bioweapons for themselves? Then again, if we second guessed every job, we'd be broke.
content.prevOriginal: I'll ask the obvious question: how do we know they won't just keep the bioweapons for themselves? Then again, if we second guessed every job, we'd be broke.
content.content: Задам очевидный вопрос: откуда мы уверены, что они просто не оставят биологическое оружие себе? Хотя с другой стороны, если бы мы выражали недоверие нанимателям, мы бы сидели на сухарях и воде.

content.original: The objective to scout the base that is being captured. Must be completed before the actual capture of the base.
content.prevOriginal: The objective to scout the base that is being captured. Must be completed before the actual capture of the base.
content.content: Цель: разведать захватываемую базу. Нужно успеть до завершения захвата.

content.original: Scout the Bioweapon Storage Site

content.original: We've got a developing situation, Commander, and we need immediate aid from a reliable mercenary company. A covert {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} team was investigating reports of a cache of bioweapons on an otherwise abandoned world. We've tracked down four of these caches in the Periphery over the last 20 years, and disposed of them safely. The team was about to signal for an extraction when their signal went dead. We have reason to believe that {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces have taken control of the cache site, and eliminated our covert team. We need you to take that site and signal our disposal team.
content.prevOriginal: We've got a developing situation, Commander, and we need immediate aid from a reliable mercenary company. A covert {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} team was investigating reports of a cache of bioweapons on an otherwise abandoned world. We've tracked down four of these caches in the Periphery over the last 20 years, and disposed of them safely. The team was about to signal for an extraction when their signal went dead. We have reason to believe that {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces have taken control of the cache site, and eliminated our covert team. We need you to take that site and signal our disposal team.
content.content: У нас непростая ситуация, командир, и нам нужна срочная помощь надежных наемников. Наша тайная группа от {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} изучала отчёты о тайнике с биологическим оружием в заброшенном мире. Мы отследили четыре из этих тайников на Периферии за последние 20 лет и благополучно избавились от них. Группа уже подавала сигнал об эвакуации, когда он пропал. У нас есть основания полагать, что силы {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} взяли под контроль тайник и устранили нашу группу. Нам нужно, чтобы вы захватили это место и подали сигнал нашей группе зачистки.
